nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_460
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I hope that the effort that we've made will be of some use to the battle against AIDS.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_461
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Despite all the efforts from the local organizations in the battle against AIDS, the number of people in rural areas diagnosed with AIDS has been increasing.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_462
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Please turn off the TV, because the noise will distract her from her homework.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_463
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: It was a long time before the company implemented the program to improve the quality of its goods because of lack of money and necessary equipment.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_464
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: You'd better learn something about the course before signing up for it.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_465
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The policy is playing a more and more important role in promoting the development of local economy.
